item.title: Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) – Survival Type ELT's

remarks.para: Any in excess of those required by FAR may be inoperative or missing.

numlitem.para: Extended overwater flights at a horizontal distance of more than 50NM from the nearest shoreline are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS screen "ELT INOPERATIVE OR MISSING" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
